If you refer to people who follow the Ahlus sunnah wal Jamaa, then there is no specific Madhab which they follow. They may follow any of the four Madhabs, viz. Hanafi, Shaafi?ee, Maaliki and Hanbaliy. Refer attached.%0D%0A%0D%0ANabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) did not follow any Madhab. These Madhabs refer to the following: Hanafis ? follow the rulings of Imaam Nu?maan ibn Thaabit Abu Hanifa, Shaafi?ees ? follow the rulings of Imaam Muhammad ibn Idrees al-Shaafi?ee, Maaliki ? follow the rulings of Imaam Maalik ibn Anas Maaliki, Hanbaliy ? follow the rulings of Imaam Ahmad ibn Hanbal.%0D%0A%0D%0A3. It is correct to perform the Qadha after Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib and Esha Salaats. (Hidaaya vol.1 pg.84; Ilmiyya).
